nodes.text: 318 was a medical droid who worked at a medical tent in Tyne's Horky, a mining town located on the planet of the same name. In the year 15 BBY, it was requested over the tent's public address system that it report to the emergency sick bay.

318 was first mentioned in "The Lost Prince," the fifth episode of the Star Wars Legends animated series Star Wars: Droids: The Adventures of R2-D2 and C-3PO, which originally aired on October 5, 1985.
